front.title: Real-Time Transport Protocol (RTP) Payload for Text Conversation Interleaved in an Audio Stream

abstract.t: This memo describes how to carry real-time text conversation session contents in RTP packets. Text conversation session contents are specified in ITU-T Recommendation T.140.</t><t> One payload format is described for transmitting audio and text data within a single RTP session.</t><t> This RTP payload description recommends a method to include redundant text from already transmitted packets in order to reduce the risk of text loss caused by packet loss. This memo defines a Historic Document for the Internet community.
